name: xAI
description: xAI is an AI platform dedicated to accelerating human scientific discovery and advancing our understanding of the universe.
longDescription: xAI is a company focused on building artificial intelligence to enhance human scientific discovery and deepen our collective understanding of the universe. Founded by Elon Musk in 2023, it develops advanced AI tools like the Grok series, designed to provide truthful and useful answers to a wide range of questions. The platform integrates with the X social media ecosystem to offer real-time insights and personalized user experiences. By offering both free and premium access, xAI caters to individual users, developers, and businesses seeking to leverage AI for research and problem-solving. Its mission emphasizes rapid innovation and solving complex challenges through AI-driven solutions. The company also engages in strategic partnerships and acquisitions to expand its capabilities, such as acquiring X Corp. in 2025.
features: Grok AI Assistant provides conversational answers with real-time data integration from X, enabling users to explore diverse topics accurately.
Image generation allows developers and users to create stunning visuals via the xAI API, enhancing creative applications.
DeepSearch functionality enables iterative web searches for comprehensive and up-to-date responses to complex queries.
Multilingual support ensures Grok can assist users globally with improved language processing and accessibility.
API integration offers developers tools to embed Grok’s capabilities into applications, supporting function calling and custom prompts.
Image editing feature lets users upload and modify photos with AI-driven changes for creative or practical purposes.

faqs.question: What is the primary purpose of xAI?
faqs.answer: xAI aims to accelerate human scientific discovery and advance understanding of the universe through advanced AI tools like Grok.

faqs.question: Is Grok available for free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grok is available for free with limited usage quotas on platforms like grok.com, x.com, and mobile apps.

faqs.question: What is the SuperGrok subscription?
faqs.answer: SuperGrok is a paid plan on grok.com offering higher usage quotas and enhanced features for advanced users.

faqs.question: Can developers use xAI’s tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, xAI provides an API for developers to integrate Grok’s AI capabilities into their applications.

faqs.question: Does xAI support image generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, xAI’s API includes image generation, allowing users to create visuals for various applications.

faqs.question: How does DeepSearch work?
faqs.answer: DeepSearch iteratively searches the web to provide comprehensive, up-to-date answers to complex user queries.

faqs.question: Is Grok available on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grok is accessible via standalone iOS and Android apps, with features like voice mode.
